text: I'm Adam, a Passionate Android developer on a mission to create intuitive and innovative mobile experciences. I have been exploring the world of Android for the last couple of years. Having switched from Views and Java to Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, I absolutely love the developer experience the latter provides. Currently seeking new opportunities to contribute my skills to exiting projects.
Born in Poland, I am a native Polish speaker and possess a B2 level proficiency in English.

Beyond programming, I took part in esports tournaments, and won a few of them, which I think not only demonstrates my passion for gaming but also showcases my ability to excel in high-pressure environments, effectively collaborate with other people and think strategically.
